hero.info: Get the tech that gets people talking With both live crowdfunding campaigns and innovative products shipping now, there’s no better place to start the hunt for cool and clever innovations that surprise and delight. Invest in idea is where new launches.

AboutUs.name: About Us
AboutUs.des: Browse campaigns, read the stories from the entrepreneurs themselves, evaluate the stage of development and any potential production risks — and then fund the projects that you want to help succeed.
AboutUs.subHeadingInfo: Many campaigns offer perks to say thanks to backers, in exchange for different contribution amounts. Perks can be objects, acknowledgement, a thank you, services, events or anything that does not violate our Terms of Use. Perks are listed on the right side of the Campaign page, under the "Back It" button. If you do not see any perks listed, the campaign owner may have decided not to offer any perks.

services.title: Services
services.info: Invest in idea crowdfunding campaigns are where new and groundbreaking products take flight, sometimes long before they hit mainstream availability. With thousands of campaigns launching every week, there's great tech, design, and much more around every corner — often with limited-time perks and pricing for the earliest backers. Before it's everywhere, it's on Invest in idea.

services.name: Get Expert Support
services.description: Our platform fuels innovative investment ideas. Entrepreneurs present groundbreaking concepts, while investors discover exciting opportunities.

services.name: Secure all your info
services.description: We prioritize your data security with cutting-edge encryption and robust safeguards. Trust us to keep your personal and financial information safe as you explore crowdfunding opportunities.

services.name: Elevate your idea
services.description: Let your ideas soar to new heights with our platform. We provide the tools and support to elevate your vision and turn it into reality.
